tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was having severe lower back pain and later the pain was radiating from my back till the feet.  Dr. Satyen diagnosed it as a disc herniation case and properly explained what was the underlying issue that was causing the excruciating pain. He advised to go with the minimally invasive surgery and explained the specifics of the same. After my surgery in USSH hospital, I was able to walk the very next day-with support; and in three days-without any support. Dr. Satyan embraces latest techniques and technology in surgery/ medical science, which helped me in solving the issues of my spine, and aided early recovery.Another great thing about him is that the way he communicates with the patients, instills confidence that we are in good hands. He calmly answers all the questions, no matter how trivial they are. I highly recommend Dr. Satyen for any spine/back related problem. Once again, thank you for helping me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My mother fell and got compression Fracture on her back. She was not able to sit and stand at all. I got her admitted to near by hospital for one week but orthopaedic doctor keep on saying that with time she will be fine and she will recover slowly. Then I got her shifted to Surana Sethia hospital and met with another orthopaedic doctor who suggested to do back surgery and put rods to give support on upper and lower bone. I decided not to go for such a big surgery as my mom was around 60 years. Then I got to know about doctor Satyen Mehta and took appointment. He explained in detail on what can be done to make my mom standup and he did laser surgery which only took few hours. And only finger size cut on the back. After one hour of surgery he entered the room and holded my mom's hand asked her to stand up. i couldn't believe that she started walking. He saved my mom twice.
Dr Mehta is very competent and helpful doctor. He listens attentively to your problems and explains the proposed treatment

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
My mother got her spine operation done from Dr Satyen Mehta Sir. From the first meeting itself he is very smart and empathetic. He told us all the details about the operation, the procedure, the materials he is going to use, .  After meeting him, she felt so comfortable that she instantly got ready  walk next day of operation. 
Also, post the operation he was always available on call. He would always answer the call and solve all our queries patiently. Itâ€™s very rare that a surgeon at his level who is always so busy takes such kind of personal interest in the patients well being. He is very kind, empathetic and encouraging. We had been to few doctors before we got to know about Dr. Mehta Sir. 
We feel doing the spine surgery with him was the best decision we could have ever made! Such an excellent doctor and such a positive experience. Thank you Dr. Mehta Sir. 
We will be strongly recommendation to everyone. If someone are facing issue to spine related. pls concern with Dr. Mehta sir. ** ** *** ** *** **** *** ** ***** ********** ** ******* 
Thank you again Dr. Mehta sir. Will always be grateful !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** ********** * ***** ******* ** ****** ******* He treated my father Mr. Lalji Yadav at Surana Sethia hospital, Chembur. My father's left leg was paining very badly, He was unable to walk. After meeting Dr. Satyen Mehta, He treated my father very well. Now he can walk easily. I like his friendly nature. Thank you very much sir!!!
Was charged 2000 rather than 1500. Apart from it, the doctor advised me for surgery even before seeing the MRI report.
